author: Epic Games
description:
Dying Light: The Beast is finally here! It’s time for you to UNLEASH THE BEAST! Dying Light: The Beast pushes what you know and love about the series to the extreme. The combat - more physical and brutal. The parkour - more grounded and realistic. The night - more tense and claustrophobic. Everything has been dialed up to eleven to create the best Dying Light experience to date! 

Unleash the Beast - Purchase Dying Light: The Beast now 👉 https://epic.gm/dl-the-beast
title: Dying Light: The Beast | Launch Trailer
